attributes.action: All petrol stations & big groceries Stores must have WC for customers in u.k
attributes.additional_details: I believe if government do this people can be saved from different diseases of kidney & bladder, even others related to these problems.
attributes.background: there are big stores like lidle and others,they don’t have wc facility, similarly most of the petrol stations are the same. some are so clever that they lock up the doors and says it’s out of order. I want from governments to bring all these under law to provide the WC facility.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is a decision for individual retailers.
